name: Accio
description: Summoning Charm - used to summon an object from a distance

name: Alohomora
description: Unlocking Charm - used to unlock and open doors

name: Avada Kedavra
description: Killing Curse - instantly kills the target; one of the three Unforgivable Curses

name: Bubble-Head Charm
description: Creates a bubble of air around the head, allowing the caster to breathe underwater or in toxic environments

name: Colloportus
description: Locking Spell - locks a door or object

name: Confundo
description: Confundus Charm - confuses the target, causing them to become disoriented and more susceptible to suggestion

name: Crucio
description: Torture Curse - causes immense pain to the target; one of the three Unforgivable Curses

name: Defodio
description: Gouging Spell - used to carve or dig into objects

name: Densaugeo
description: Enlarging Spell - causes the target's teeth to grow at an alarming rate

name: Depulso
description: Banishing Charm - used to push objects away from the caster

name: Diffindo
description: Severing Charm - used to cut or rip objects apart

name: Disillusionment Charm
description: Used to make the target blend into their surroundings, becoming invisible or nearly so

name: Draught of Living Death
description: A potion that puts the drinker into a deep, death-like sleep

name: Engorgio
description: Enlarging Charm - used to make objects larger

name: Episkey
description: Healing Spell - used to heal minor injuries

name: Expecto Patronum
description: Patronus Charm - used to conjure a Patronus, a guardian that protects against Dementors and other dark creatures

name: Expelliarmus
description: Disarming Charm - used to disarm an opponent and send their wand flying out of their hand

name: Fidelius Charm
description: Used to conceal a secret within the soul of a trusted individual; only they can reveal the secret to others

name: Finite Incantatem
description: General Counterspell - used to end the effects of many spells and enchantments

name: Flagrate
description: Used to draw fiery shapes or writing in the air

name: Flipendo
description: Knockback Jinx - used to knock over or push back objects and creatures

name: Furnunculus
description: Pimple Jinx - causes the target to break out in painful boils

name: Geminio
description: Gemino Curse - creates a duplicate of an object

name: Glisseo
description: Vanishing Charm - used to vanish or transform stairs into a slide

name: Homenum Revelio
description: Revealing Charm - used to detect human presence in a specific area

name: Impedimenta
description: Impediment Jinx - slows or immobilizes the target

name: Imperio
description: Imperius Curse - gives the caster complete control over the target's actions; one of the three Unforgivable Curses

name: Incarcerous
description: Conjures ropes or chains to bind the target

name: Lumos
description: Creates a beam of light from the tip of the wand

name: Meteolojinx Recanto
description: Weather-Modifying Charm - used to end the effects of a weather-modifying spell

name: Muffliato
description: Muffling Charm - used to prevent nearby people from overhearing a conversation

name: Nox
description: Puts out the light created by Lumos

name: Obliviate
description: Memory Charm - erases memories from the target's mind

name: Obscuro
description: Used to blindfold the target

name: Oppugno
description: Used to make conjured objects attack the target

name: Orchideous
description: Conjures a bouquet of flowers from the tip of the wand

name: Pack
description: Used to pack objects into a container

name: Petrificus Totalus
description: Full Body-Bind Curse - immobilizes the target completely

name: Point Me
description: Spell used to point the caster in the direction of their desired destination

name: Portus
description: Portkey Spell - used to create an object that can transport the user to a specific location

name: Prior Incantato
description: Reveals the last spell cast by a wand

name: Protego
description: Shield Charm - creates a magical shield that protects the caster from spells and physical objects

name: Reducto
description: Reduction Charm - used to blast solid objects apart

name: Relashio
description: Used to release a person or object from being held or bound

name: Reparo
description: Mending Charm - used to repair broken objects

name: Rictusempra
description: Tickling Charm - causes the target to experience uncontrollable laughter

name: Riddikulus
description: Used to turn a Boggart into something humorous, thus defeating it

name: Scourgify
description: Cleaning Charm - used to clean dirt and grime off of objects

name: Sectumsempra
description: Used to cause deep wounds on the target; invented by Severus Snape

name: Silencio
description: Silencing Charm - used to silence the target

name: Sonorus
description: Amplifies the caster's voice

name: Stupefy
description: Stunning Spell - used to knock out the target

name: Tarantallegra
description: Leg Jinx - causes the target's legs to dance uncontrollably

name: Tergeo
description: Used to remove material from a surface

name: Unbreakable Vow
description: Magical vow that, if broken, results in the death of the person who made the vow; requires a third party as witness and binder

name: Wingardium Leviosa
description: Levitation Charm - used to levitate objects
